summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of ICE-related components in a WebRTC library, including processing of connection keyword arguments for STUN/TURN servers, parsing of STUN/TURN URIs, default ICE server configuration and candidate gathering, and the behavior of the ICE transport state machine.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correct handling of ICE configuration and operation within the real‑time communication stack, ensuring reliable peer‑to‑peer connectivity and compliance with STUN/TURN specifications.
